chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
chunks.text: Learning the concept of Inline and Block Elements in HTML is very important.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
chunks.text: Inline elements are those which are required to take the width of the screen.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
chunks.text: And Block Elements are those which take the entire width of the screen.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
chunks.text: It is also called Display Property which can be set through CSS.

chunks.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
chunks.text: If you are enjoying this video so far then do like this video.

text: Learning the concept of Inline and Block Elements in HTML is very important. Inline elements are those which are required to take the width of the screen. And Block Elements are those which take the entire width of the screen. It is also called Display Property which can be set through CSS. If you are enjoying this video so far then do like this video. So let's go to the computer screen and look closely at Inline and Block Elements. Through some very good examples, let's roll the intro. So guys, we are now at Inline and Block Elements. If you haven't accessed the playlist and haven't accessed the code then do both. Because as soon as the videos are being made, the code and video are being added to the playlist. Now I will quickly make a folder called Video 8. So I have already added 7 videos here. I will make a video 8 and open it in VS Code. After opening it, I will tell you about the index and block elements by turning on index.html. I have entered the exclamation mark and I could type this but I will not do it because it is a Y type.
